bug.summary: [BUG]Stuck in manual mode on my pi0W v1.1.0
bug.description:
Describe the bug Can't boot to auto mode. What I've done
I flash v1.1.0 in my brand new sd card. Add a(vim) config.yml in my /Volumes/boot; add below configuration: ================================== main: plugins: grid: enabled: true ui: display: type: 'waveshare213d' color: 'black' ==================================
(I use waveshare 213(B) turn out the above configuration work fine) 3.Connect the pi to its power port. Wait 30 minutes. 4.It stay in auto mode for about 10 minutes, but the screen change from 'auto 'to 'manu' automatically. Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. I expect it to stay in auto mode since I only plug the power port of my rpi0W Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Environment (please complete the following information):
v1.1.0 mac OS rpi0W waveshare 213b
